Class Ghost

java.lang.Object
com.gr15.pacman.model.entities.Entity
com.gr15.pacman.model.entities.Ghost
public class Ghost extends Entity
Represents a ghost in the Pacman game. Each ghost has a specific type and uses a pathfinding strategy to move toward a target position (goal). The ghost's movement logic is controlled by its current goal and it's SearchStrategy.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ghost

      public Ghost(Position startPos, double speed, double radius, Position goal, Ghost.GhostType type, com.gr15.pacman.model.entities.searching.SearchStrategy searchStrategy)
      Constructs a new Ghost instance.
      Parameters:
      startPos - The initial position of the ghost.
      speed - The movement speed of the ghost.
      radius - The collision radius of the ghost.
      goal - The goal for the ghost will move towards.
      type - The ghost's type (e.g., RED, BLUE, PINK, or ORANGE).
      searchStrategy - The strategy used by this ghost to find paths.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move(GameState.TileType[][] board, double deltaSeconds)
      Updates the ghost's direction and moves it toward its current goal, using the assigned search strategy to find the shortest path.
      Overrides:
      move in class Entity
      Parameters:
      board - The game board used to determine walkable tiles.
      deltaSeconds - Time passed since the last frame.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if board is null.
